column4: Am I the only one who thinks the decisions the Ubuntu dev team are making are completely detached from the reality of using Ubuntu?
Two random examples off the top of my head: ESD, gnome-screensaver.
I cannot believe the GNOME team bundled keycombos into Metacity. Have they not heard of modularising? That sort of stuff should be handled by a daemon!
this is not reeally a suitable place to rant about such things
